caption.p: Flowchart of analysis. ( a) Processing of the RNA-Seq dataset; ( b) identification of Monotonically Expressed Genes using the MFSelector approach [ 93]; ( c) promoter analysis (TSS: transcription start site); ( d) identification of cooperative transcription factors (TFs) using the PC-TraFF approach [ 42]; and, ( e) Expression pattern analysis of TF genes.
